website_summaries.verdict: This retro game received a DC Comics reskin featuring the Man of Steel and the Dark Knight, but socking ‘em is just as fun now as it was in 1964.
pros: Batman and Superman replace the classic red and blue robots
Detailed and large superhero boxing figures
cons: Pricier than the normal Rock ‘em Sock ‘em Robots toy

customer_reviews.title: Just don’t..
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping to get a Batman vs Superman version of rock em sockem robots that I played as a kid. These didn’t come with any “board” to play on so you basically have each person holding one figure. Strange but okay I guess.. they kept breaking though so it wasn’t even something my kid could play with. Sorry.. no stars here, it was a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made, not very functional
customer_reviews.text: Thought this would be a really fun game for superhero-obsessed boy, but the base and controls don't stay together very well and the punching power is very limited. The controls fell off the base during play regularly. Batman's arms are much bigger than Superman's, so it is hard to even get Superman to punch Batman. I would say, at best, this is a frustrating game for kids and not a lot of fun for adults either. Wound up just leaving the guys off the stand to play with separately. Pretty hefty price for some cheap plastic action figures.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Bat Bias
customer_reviews.text: I bought this gift for my very nerdy friend who loves Batman. The product is very durable, although the colors are are lighter than displayed on the box. The problem we have with this product is that seems to biased towards Batman. Batman’s angle lower to the face while Superman’s is higher, making it easier to win as Batman. Also, it is way easier to pop Superman than it is Batman. We still enjoyed it as it was still fun to laugh at the constant loser.
customer_reviews.author: Jazmin

customer_reviews.title: WIN/WIN
customer_reviews.text: Such a fun game but Poor Superman got a raw deal! My grandson loves Superman so that's who he always wants to be. I get to be Batman. Batman's fists are much larger than Superman's and Superman punches up and down! What?! So grandma almost always wins - even when she's not trying to. One punch from Batman and Superman goes flying off his rock. Hint: Superman's left hand punches straighter so if you can get it angled toward Batman's head - YAY! Grandson & Superman win! Grandson does a happy dance! Grandma's heart melts! WIN/WIN!!
customer_reviews.author: DebBum

customer_reviews.title: Gift to Grandson
customer_reviews.text: I grew up with the original rock-em sock-em robots. This was a little disappointing after giving it to my 5 yr old grandson. He doesn't know any better because he thinks it looks cool. The coolness quickly wore of for me. It's seems difficult to make a connecting hit to win. Not sure how well it will hold up after a while. May try to buy the original to see the difference.
customer_reviews.author: Scott H

customer_reviews.title: Superman super-sticks to his platform.
customer_reviews.text: Great concept, and I like that they aren't connected in any way, but superman is waaaaay harder to knock off than batman. Which is probably accurate, as far as how a battle would go down between the two, given that Superman's powers are ridiculous, but not as fun in real life. Kids still like it, though, but not as much as they would if the two were equal. Hopefully superman will loosen up over time.
customer_reviews.author: TiredMom

customer_reviews.title: Awesome buy!
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old son and I both adore these!! It's cool to not have them stuck in the ring like the classic robot version, it gives more options when playing and it's really fun to see what his imagination will come up with. Sometimes he will have his guy "fly" through the air and swoop down to punch mine lol. They are sturdy too, we have dropped them and smashed them into each other a hundred times and they hold up to the abuse with no problems!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Alexander

customer_reviews.title: They love them, as did their Daddy
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my grand kids ages 6 and 7. They love them, as did their Daddy. Played for hours without fights like other games lead to. Now they can battle it out and not lay a hand on each other. I remember the Rock em Sock em robots of my generation and they are a bit different. The looser flies off his stage as opposed to the head flying up on the robots. Definitely better for younger ones. The are really sturdy also, a plus if your boy breaks things easily. Would recommend, and I did get a great deal on them. Can't beat Amazon lightening deals.
customer_reviews.author: Michael s thrower

customer_reviews.title: Batman/Superman Rock'em Sock'em
customer_reviews.text: Received quickly. Items looked just like advertised in photos. I was disappointed with the limited action they preform. Once you hit one of their heads, Batman or Superman, comes off of the base. That's it. I had a hard time re-packing in the box it came in. It took a lot of pressure taking the controller off of the base. I thought it was going to break. I anticipate it happening over time.
customer_reviews.author: Linda S

customer_reviews.title: Loved it. Superman toy has higher probability to knock-off Batman due shorter height.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my nephew. He loved it. We played a lot and enjoyed it. Only hiccup I see is that the Superman is a bit shorter in height that Batman. This gives Superman advantage as the game is about who pushes the head of opponent back. When head of opponent is back, it gets out of groove. Since Superman is relatively shorter, there is higher probability of knocking off Batman. With hours of play, I could observe this. Other's opinion might differ from mine. Its their thought. :)
customer_reviews.author: Hemanth P

customer_reviews.title: Makes a great gift for a Spiderman/Batman lover
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old nephew loved this gift. He couldn't stop thanking me. Unfortunately it arrived broken. Spiderman just wouldn't stay on his base, which made it impossible to play. I notified Amazon of the issue, and they sent me a replacement in less than 48 hours. I definitely recommend this gift for the superhero fan in your life. They will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Can't Rock Em Sock Em
customer_reviews.text: I was a little disappointed in this product. It's really cool to have a rock em sock em superhero but even putting them basically touching they don't really hit each other. The directions say to place them at least 2 inches apart but they don't even come close to reaching each other at that distance. It also seems that when you are pushing the buttons to make them "fight" the superheroes sometimes just fall over from the movement.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya

customer_reviews.title: Kids Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I'll go with my kids here- they LOVE this. I think the robots pop off a little too quickly- but maybe I am just saying that because I keep getting beat by little boys. LOL! The quality and detail is strong and better than expected for the price we paid. We've had a lot of fun with this.
customer_reviews.author: T. Arteaga

customer_reviews.title: Not connected to each other!
customer_reviews.text: My son loved this toy. The people are not connected to each Other. Makes playing a little harder. They broke after a few months. Still Happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best version of rock em sock em
customer_reviews.text: Materials are much more durable than standard sock ems, not to mention awesome batman and superman figures. They are much more modern than those classsic ones. Movement also much more free to move around rather than stuck in a tiny ring
customer_reviews.author: jdea

customer_reviews.title: "Rock Em Sock  Em Robots great"
customer_reviews.text: Now this is so cute. Got it for my grandson I was a little worry at first cause on box it sound great . He love batman so he played it with his sister & when superman won he got mad, so don't know if he will play with it again if batman can't win. But I like the sizes of them not a small little ones like the older ones when you fight them their head pop off, no you have to nock them off of their stand a little harder but for the best. Very great .
customer_reviews.author: ann

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this toy
customer_reviews.text: Horrible. I'm the grandma that always gets the cool gifts. I can't say horrible enough. Don't buy this. I bought it for my 5 year old grandson. He said, Gram, this doesn't work right. He was correct. It takes so many punches to knock them off the block, even my hand got tired.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila P.

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy 👍🏽
customer_reviews.text: Girllllll let me tell you! I got this for my boyfriend’s nephew and what I loved about it is it doesn’t need batteries so you can play immediately and for however long you want. Also no tools needed because it comes already set up. I hope he likes it cause I loved it. Buy it Sis! You won’t be sorry 😁😉
customer_reviews.author: Elle 7

customer_reviews.title: Superman character would not release properly
customer_reviews.text: We bought the first set and returned it because the Superman character would not release. We got the replacement and it had the same problem, but not as severe. The differendce means the child playing with the Superman charcter ALWAYS LOSES! We kept it because of a difficult return policy. But it will end up in the trash. I would recommend againt purchasing thiis toy.
customer_reviews.author: Edwin G. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Super fun and durable toys but Batman tends to win
customer_reviews.text: These are extremely durable toys and they are very fun to play with. I purchased them because my boyfriend is a Superman fan, which is fine I just like to mess with him, and I had read in the reviews that Batman has an advantage and Superman tends to lose. This turned out to be very true! If you know this going in and you're okay with it, these are a lot of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Batman is heavily favored
customer_reviews.text: These are cool. They’re fun and they do what they’re made to do. BUT, it seems that the design inevitably favors Batman’s victory. His arms are slightly longer and bulkier than his competitor, Superman. I feel like that’s a major design flaw in the aspect that the traditional robots had no selected champion. Just be sure to choose Batman when you play is all 😎👍
customer_reviews.author: Fallon

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my 4 year old son as a Christmas gift. The toy itself looks really cool, but it is seriously defective. I read other reviews (after the fact) that stated Batman always wins. In my set, it is Superman who always wins to which my son justifies it by saying, “Superman is stronger.” LOL. Eventually he started to figure out that Batman would just pop off without being punched. Thankfully, he has a good imagination and is pretty content with them just “fighting”. I just wished it worked properly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor Design
customer_reviews.text: My nephew loved these because of the Super Hero aspect. However, if you truly hold the items on the floor, when you are socking the arms do not reach. You have to pick it up to make it pop off the stand. After they came off the stand, they would not go back in to stay without several attempts. Not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Allen Dyer

customer_reviews.title: I was REALLY disappointed. Superman will just automatically eject from his stand ...
customer_reviews.text: Batman always wins. This is not a game of competition.....I was REALLY disappointed. Superman will just automatically eject from his stand when barely touched. Batman never falls no matter how hard he is hit. Something is very wrong with this. My grandsons thought it was funny at first, but they can't play with it because it doesn't work.
customer_reviews.author: dj

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: The batman figure keeps falling off if you breathe on it wrong, and the superman one doesn't come off even if batman hits him repeatedly. This just frustrated the kids instead of giving them something fun.
customer_reviews.author: TheyKeepOnRising

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy!
customer_reviews.text: Fun! My 4 and 5 year old have fun with these. They have also figured out how to take it all apart. It went back together ok though, just be sure to match up the pieces by there super hero symbols.
customer_reviews.author: ApplePearl

customer_reviews.title: Lots of stupid fun, but not very fairly designed.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift. We (30-year-old adults) had a lot of fun with it after a few drinks. However, the game is definitely rigged in Batman's favor (maybe on purpose, considering the movie it's based on?), which makes it not as fun for people looking to legitimately compete.
customer_reviews.author: Josh L.

customer_reviews.title: do yourself a favor buy the original style, not this new style!
customer_reviews.text: These do not work like the original, the heads do not pop up, instead the entire figure falls off the stand, not as good as the original and one fell off easier than the other so that spoiled it.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Allen

customer_reviews.title: Great Toy
customer_reviews.text: This was for my sons 6th birthday. I have to say he and his little brother put a beating on these things and they hold up well. Great game. Only reason for 4 stars is because the superman is a lot easier to knock off then batman. So a lot of fighting over who gets batman. Besides that. Great toy!
customer_reviews.author: Jaybird

customer_reviews.title: Okay toy
customer_reviews.text: The toy is surprisingly big and good quality material. The way the figures are built, though, it is difficult to knock one of the characters off because the arms are not long enough.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Awesome toy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my nephew for christmas, he loves super heroes.. He has not quit playing with them and takes them everywhere with him, even to his brothers soccer game where he and his friend played with them on the bleachers.. lol.. He is 5 years old..
customer_reviews.author: JRoths

customer_reviews.title: Defective and poorly made
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a nostalgic gift for my husband, when he was younger he had the original rock em sock em robots. These definitely didn’t live up to the hype, the arms on Batman are not the same size as Superman’s so regardless how much adjusting you do Superman pops off every single time. Batman’s arms on the toy are visibly larger and are placed higher on his body which makes the “challenge” of the toy game non existent because Superman will fall every single time. I know this wasn’t going to be something he’d use all the time but it was just kind of a let down.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: It works!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my best friend who loves comics(as do i..Marvel, DC) for his birthday, and he loved it! Definitely great as a gift; Birthdays, Christmas...or in general just a good gift for any DC comic fans.
customer_reviews.author: Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Nice and well built
customer_reviews.text: Lacking one star because batman falls off the base easier than superman thus fight is a bit unfair. Solved by a little sandpaper. But overall build quality is nice and toy looks good enough to sit on a shelf and not in a toy box.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super
customer_reviews.text: Kid loved this game but Batman I think broke because he just kinda pops off on his own. Otherwise way better than the original.
customer_reviews.author: DPLS

customer_reviews.title: One figure weaker then other.
customer_reviews.text: Imo: Would be great simple fun but....one figure gets knocked of to easy and basically loses ever time and fairly quick. That takes a lot of the fun out of it therefore I say three stars fix that and 4- 5 stars .
customer_reviews.author: mrbasicshark

customer_reviews.title: Batmans the winner!
customer_reviews.text: My grandson asked for rock-em-sock robots and loves super heros, so I got him these. They are fun, but we miss the heads popping off. The whole body falls off the stand instead and Batman wins 80% of the time. But it is smaller and transports well.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa  L

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Grandson just loved them, played with all day on Christmas. Just like the original rockem socket from years ago.
customer_reviews.author: SHELLEY K

customer_reviews.title: Batman is always the underdog!
customer_reviews.text: It was supposed to be a fun game. But, Batman falls of with the least amount of pressure. I didn’t think Superman was really the champ ALL of the time, but with this toy, you have no choice. Superman always wins.
customer_reviews.author: melissa

customer_reviews.title: Brought it because my kids love superman, but it doesn't work like it should
customer_reviews.text: Brought it because my kids love superman, but it doesn't work like it should. Batman always win and it's too sensitive, a light touch to the head and the figure will pop out of place. Also wish they made it easier to remove the figures from the base so I can put back in the box when done playing.
customer_reviews.author: DT

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: My 5 yo son loved this for his birthday present. Batman does tend to get knocked off a lot easier than SuperMan though, so I play this one and my son has a blast winning.
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t last !!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve gotten this item twice, the first one i had to return immediately because the batman would fall down even if you look at him and now after barely playing with this toy, the batman arms are no longer working 🤦🏻‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Blaga

customer_reviews.title: rock n sock em robots
customer_reviews.text: disappointed in this toy, the men are hard to get on the stands and not very sturdy toy.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia A Acon

customer_reviews.title: Batman Holds The Title
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 27 year old sin who is a Batman fanatic. I'm pretty sure it was his favorite Christmas present.Batman
customer_reviews.author: Nancy H.

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Love the idea of the Rock 'em Sock 'em Robots in Superman/Batman format, but it does miss one thing....the heads don't pop up when they're hit. But what the heck, the Grandson loves it!
customer_reviews.author: David O

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes I think all Amazon reviews are paid for, because I don't know what else to think about products with 5-star review that suck. This toy - only the arms of the superheros are slightly moving (very little). You push the 2 buttons in the back and the arms are slightly moving, not even extending fully. You only end up kicking the other player's toy off if you move your toy and actually punch the opposing fighter with your entire toy. I bought this as a gift and was actually embarrassed when the toy came out of the box and the kids started playing.
customer_reviews.author: HappyFloridian

customer_reviews.title: superhero fun
customer_reviews.text: Great toy. No batteries which is great, My grandson loves battling with his dad .. Puts him on a level footing so he can beat bigger people! Good value for price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointing my boys wont even play it considering Batman wins EVERY time.. superman can punch batman 6x but if batman punches superman 1x it's game over.
customer_reviews.author: sean

customer_reviews.title: Amazing gift.
customer_reviews.text: My nephew loved this gift. I love this original game, so it was cool to get the same concept in a more related theme for him.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: One of the superheroes doesn’t even fit correctly into the base, so the other one wins every time, after only a few seconds. Very disappointing and I was very excited to give this to my nephew bc it was a toy from my childhood. It’s just a non-functioning gimmick now and will sadly be going in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke in under 6 months, doesn't hold up as well as other toys in the super hero genre.
customer_reviews.text: Was great until batman's arm snapped off at the elbow. Now superman has a chance in the fight I guess. Toy lasted less than 6 months. We expected more.
customer_reviews.author: Sergiox2X2x

customer_reviews.title: Classic battle toy fun durable priced right
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great toy for a kid. Hours of fun to be had playing with this toy
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Not for 5 yr olds - but good for adults!
customer_reviews.text: Not really easy for a 5 year old to play with - coordination isn't good enough yet. When he's older it will be better. But the adults liked it.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas M.

customer_reviews.title: Rock Em Sock Em - Batman & Superman
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as an extra present for Christmas, Not very expensive, but Wow, were they the hit of all presents for the Grandkids, They Loved them, and the Parents did too. Such a simple gift, but the Receiver Loved IT!
customer_reviews.author: Danno

customer_reviews.title: Fun take on an old classic
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my cousin’s 2 young boys who are obsessed with superhero’s. They loved it and spent the entire day playing with it.
customer_reviews.author: ash

customer_reviews.title: Cheap junk nothing like original
customer_reviews.text: This toy is a piece of junk. They are nothing like the original. The bots don’t stay in their post so the game is over in seconds. Waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: These are so cool. I bought them for my kids but my ...
customer_reviews.text: These are so cool. I bought them for my kids but my boyfriend and I are always fighting over who gets to play! It's a classic spin on a game we all loved as kids. My children can't get enough! If you love to hear your kiddos laughing, get them this game.
customer_reviews.author: samanthalvee

customer_reviews.title: Sock em
customer_reviews.text: My nephew loved this for Xmas. Great because everyone in the family can play with the kids with this toy. Just a simple who has quicker hands kinda thing.
customer_reviews.author: JA

customer_reviews.title: Kid approved!
customer_reviews.text: Got on a Black Friday deal half price! My nephew loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Spooner

customer_reviews.title: Kids love these! They have lasted a long time which ...
customer_reviews.text: Kids love these! They have lasted a long time which is hard for toys to do with my 2 and 4 year old. I have purchased them 3 times for gifts too. Durable and fun. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my five-year-old and he loves it! Easy to assemble, easy to use. Seems pretty durable.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Knock out
customer_reviews.text: My grandson enjoyed this item. Had trouble getting him to eat as he didn't want to put it down. Great gift.
customer_reviews.author: PETER CARISTI

customer_reviews.title: Gift for my grandson.
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift. Packaged very well. My grandson will love it.
customer_reviews.author: Ron H.

customer_reviews.title: Just okay, wish these were on some sort of ...
customer_reviews.text: Just okay, wish these were on some sort of base that each character stays on so you can’t lift the figure off the surface.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Fun but not a ton
customer_reviews.text: My husband had the old version and would like this to be on one solid surface instead of two separate platforms. One super hero is better able to knock the other one down because of how each is positioned/made.
customer_reviews.author: rachel P.

customer_reviews.title: Buy the original
customer_reviews.text: Loved the concept but Batman’s right arm doesn’t always throw punches and needs to be adjusted
customer_reviews.author: Cindi Berry

customer_reviews.title: Time killer!
customer_reviews.text: My toddler loves them. Easy for him to control and it’s a time killer. Definitely keeps him occupied for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Carmela

customer_reviews.title: dissatisfied
customer_reviews.text: One of them pops off every time you punch the other
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn

customer_reviews.title: Must buy.
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun toy for boys. I have a 2 and 4 year old and they love playing play fight with the two super heroes
customer_reviews.author: Jason Adams

customer_reviews.title: Terrible toy. All around
customer_reviews.text: Terrible toy. All around. They don't work, terrible design. Pretty sure Batman is way easier to knock off than super man (which is wrong on so many levels haha) i wouldn't recommend this toy.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Bullock

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t buy again
customer_reviews.text: Definitely wouldn’t buy again. Nothing like the classic ones. They don’t work very well.
customer_reviews.author: A.tupa

customer_reviews.title: Very well made
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift for my 4 year old grandson and he loves it - it was easy for an adult to put together and appears very sturdy. There were many "bouts" on Christmas day and the day after and the figures survived very well. Both adults and children loved it.
customer_reviews.author: C. Yandow

customer_reviews.title: Steer Clear - Not made like they used to be.
customer_reviews.text: The presentation is awesome, but the quality is very disappointing. It broke within the first 5 minutes. Packaged it up for return on Christmas day.
customer_reviews.author: Casandra D.

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun !
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my grandsons. They loved it! They had received other gifts but kept returning to play with this item! Something so simple brought lots of hours of fun!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worst toy ever!
customer_reviews.text: These suck! Literally for a kids toy it makes no sense. They're not attached and you Have allign in between each the arms and use one arm only to even Have a chance. Got for 5 year old Boys and its 100% a waste of money. Can't believe we spent $50!!!! Returning asap!
customer_reviews.author: Dunns

customer_reviews.title: But otherwise great party gift for my 34 year old boyfriend
customer_reviews.text: Batmans arms are longer, so he always wins. But otherwise great party gift for my 34 year old boyfriend. We set them up on the table at the restaurant and everyone wanted to play, even the waiter :)
customer_reviews.author: lhessler

customer_reviews.title: Toddler approved
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for 6 year old boy. He loved it and plays with his 9 year old brother
customer_reviews.author: Esme

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: My nephew 6 year old nephew liked them. Box seemed like it had been sitting in a warehouse for a while. It was kind of scratched up.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Preston

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loved this last Christmas. Still enjoying it 4 months later!
customer_reviews.author: Terry B

customer_reviews.title: Good toy but with them being separated the kids get ...
customer_reviews.text: Good toy but with them being separated the kids get excited and they fall off. My only complaint is that. I think it would be a perfect toy if they were standing on one solid platform
customer_reviews.author: Loyal to a fault

customer_reviews.title: Boxing toy
customer_reviews.text: Get what you pay for Kids are gonna break it
customer_reviews.author: Loretta Billings

customer_reviews.title: Batman is the winner.....
customer_reviews.text: If I had the chance to ho back to order these or the classic version, I would pick classic, to much trouble to return after kid opened up for a present, batman always wins, superman is "weak" in the game. Kid loves the present but already knows who to pick to win.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron D

customer_reviews.title: Husband loved it as his first father's day gift
customer_reviews.text: Husband loved it as his first father's day gift. It's a fun toy. Batman does seem to win most matches due to his bigger and longer arms but that's ok, because hubby is a die hard Batman fan ☺
customer_reviews.author: G Rod

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy!!
customer_reviews.text: This is great! Exactly as pictured and works exactly as described! My 2 year old grandson and my husband are having a blast playing with these! Quality is great also!
customer_reviews.author: Diane B

customer_reviews.title: Product is nice
customer_reviews.text: Nice product overall. Purchased for my grandson. I was expecting the figures’ heads to pop-up, as the original version did when I was a kid.
customer_reviews.author: EB

customer_reviews.title: Seriously?
customer_reviews.text: One ALWAYS wins. Batman. Constantly. I don't know if this is due to the movie and it's meant to be this way, but the gift recipient wasn't amused. Neither was I.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: My son received this for Christmas and it was defected . Sent it back and this one that we just received now is perfect ! Non stop playing this he loves it !
customer_reviews.author: B82

customer_reviews.title: Either way it's great cause my 2 year old loves Batman so it's ...
customer_reviews.text: Batman seems to be more difficult to knock off, maybe its just ours. Either way it's great cause my 2 year old loves Batman so it's cool he gets to win.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Everything
customer_reviews.text: Brother always enjoy his toys. Batman & Superman are his favorite.
customer_reviews.author: HG357

customer_reviews.title: What a great spin on a classic
customer_reviews.text: Gifted this to my son for his 4 year old birthday, and he loved it! He plays with me, his sister, and his older cousins and even as rough as the boys are it is very sturdy and going strong! Excellent toy well made and I would definitely recommend 😊
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Beckom

customer_reviews.title: I'm buying More!!!!
customer_reviews.text: So awesome !!! This is mad super cool!!! I'm so buying my own and 2 more for other nephews bdays coming up! Long before apps iPads angry birds and even Mario...there was ROCK EM SOCK EM ROBOTS!!
customer_reviews.author: Campbell

customer_reviews.title: It is nothing like the original game
customer_reviews.text: Was expecting so much more of this product! It is nothing like the original game! It is almost impossible to even knock the opponents head back or knock them off. The punches are weak and do not do anything! VERY DISAPPOINTED! And so is my 7 year old son!!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Hampton-Hullett

customer_reviews.title: FALLS OVER EASILY
customer_reviews.text: The action figures fall over easily and one seems to work better than the other. My two grandsons lost interest fast. Its just siting in the corning now, collecting dust.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Tovar

customer_reviews.title: It was cute but would have been better if it was made together on a solid surface ...
customer_reviews.text: It was cute but would have been better if it was made together on a solid surface like the older model wrestling game.
customer_reviews.author: LNicole

customer_reviews.title: Pointless and cheap
customer_reviews.text: Poorly made. Doesn't even stand up. Batman just falls over immediately. The heads do not pop up which is what made rock'em sock'em robots iconoclastic. Not fun. Pointless.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My kid loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My 5 yr old loves it. Product also seems to be made well.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Fun for a minute
customer_reviews.text: Not that impressed. Batman's head on our set doesn't come off as easy as superman.
customer_reviews.author: Lora Goss

customer_reviews.title: He loved it
customer_reviews.text: Twins birthday....one got the original, one got this one. Both loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Nant

customer_reviews.title: Great toy, but poor Superman design
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old really loves this toy, but Superman is knocked off way too easily so it kind of kills the game for us.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Superman's arm is short
customer_reviews.text: Unique and cool however, Superman's arm is shorter than Batman's and so it's easier to knock off Superman
customer_reviews.author: Artemis

product_meta.title: Rock 'em Sock 'em Robots Batman v Superman [Amazon Exclusive]
product_meta.description:
Inspired by the upcoming Batman v. Superman: Dawn of Justice movie, it’s a new twist on an old classic! You know Rock ‘Em Sock ‘Em Robots, but now Batman and Superman are duking it out! Players try to move the two legendary superheroes into position and hammer the other until one goes “flying!” Skillfully placed hits will send the other hero right off the platform! Battle it out in the ultimate showdown with realistic sounds and jaw-jolting action. Land a superhero-worthy punch to be declared the winner and hear the victorious K.O. sound. Designed for two players, this exciting game lets each opponent control his superhero by operating the corresponding mechanism with his or her thumbs. Push the right button to deliver a right hook, or push the left to punch with your hero’s left arm. You can also shift your superhero’s position in the ring by moving the controls left and right. Kids control the intensity of the battle with their thumb speed and expert battling skills. Features one Batman and one Superman figure. Each sold separately, subject to availability. Colors and decorations may vary.

BRAND STORY
By Mattel Games
feature_bullets: Inspired by the movie Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice.
Batman and Superman star in this classic game.
Move them into position and pummel back and forth until one superhero “flies” off the platform!
Exciting boxing action where opponents maneuver and fight it out for fun!
Includes two thumb-operated mechanisms and two battling superheroes.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
